page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KIRSTY
page.content: On weekdays I get up at 7.50 am. I make my bed and get washed. Then I get dressed and go downstairs. I have my breakfast which is a couple of slices of toast and a cup of tea. I do the dishes and leave for Barsail Primary School. School starts at 9.00 am. Most of the morning is taken up with arithmetic and our project work. I go home for lunch at 12.00 pm. In the afternoon a teacher from Park Mains High School visits us to teach us French. When school finishes at 3.30 pm,I rush home to change and do my homework. For dinner I have roast beef, roast potatoes and some vegetables. Afterwards I play on my bike with my friends. Then I watch television, have supper and get ready for bed.
